title: Configure Monitoring Systems to Record Network
audit_procedure: Navigate to the UI Path articulated in the Remediation section and confirm it is set as prescribed. This group policy setting is backed by the following registry location with a REG_DWORD value of 1. HKLM\SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Services\LDAP:LDAPClientIntegrity
remediation_procedure: section and confirm it is set as prescribed. This group policy setting is backed by the following registry location with a REG_DWORD value of 1. HKLM\SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Services\LDAP:LDAPClientIntegrity
default_value: Negotiate signing. (If Transport Layer Security/Secure Sockets Layer (TLS/SSL) has not been started, the LDAP BIND request is initiated with the LDAP data signing option set in addition to the caller-specified options. If TLS/SSL has been started, the LDAP BIND request is initiated with the caller-specified options.)
